headline.main: 8,000-WORD BARRAGE FIRED AT U.S. BY GAYDA; Article Says Our Submarines Operate in Mediterranean

lead_paragraph: ROME, Sept. 20 -- With the verbosity that he displays only when discussing questions of vital importance to Italy, Virginio Gayda has written a seven-column editorial to prove that President Roosevelt has deceived the American people by slowly dragging them into war in contradiction of his pre-election promises.
abstract: Pres campaign of 1940: Gayda charges Roosevelt drags U S into war despite pledges

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
